name: Energy Cycle
description: 'Energy Cycle' – new puzzle game from the developers of ‘Energy Balance’. When you click each cell on the game field - it changes color, and the colors of adjacent cells horizontally and vertically. Your task to bring all the cells to the same color. Sounds pretty easy, but try to do it!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 3.0 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

reviews.review_text: This game is VERY innovative. I spent a LONG time on level 23. Warning: VERY HARD, if you have no memory. lol
I liked the game good casual puzzle game good soundtracks  and low price
